short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 0xBook: AddressBook for Koinly, Etherscan, BscScan, and Polygonscan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 0xBook is an external address book for Koinly, Etherscan, BscScan, and Polygonscan and more to come. Addresses can be replaced with labels, making cryptic addresses a thing of the past and making transfers and contract interactions easier to trace.
